source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_00<tab>Vajra is ready to guide you to Djanan Qhat.
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_00<tab>Важра готова сопроводить вас в Джанан Кхат.

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_01<tab>Upon witnessing her daughter's death at the hands of Fordola and her Skulls, the Qalyana broodmother cried out to the heavens in despair...and a primal answered. Sri Lakshmi, patron deity of the Ananta, came forth from the aether, and the imperials were put to flight. Alas, the tale did not end there, for now the Qalyana demand that the Vira come and pay tribute to the goddess. And so it falls to you and your comrades to journey unto the Qalyana stronghold of Djanan Qhat, where Sri Lakshmi now holds court.

TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_02<tab>Vajra leads you to the edge of the Qalyana settlement and tells you of the aetheryte within, which will deliver you to the heart of Djanan Qhat. However, given what they have heard of the primal's reclusive behavior, your comrades have expressed reservations. Must all primals be slain? Are they truly beyond reason?

TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_03<tab>Fortunately, as is often the case, simply attuning with the aetheryte is enough to grant you and your comrades access to the inner sanctum. Caution is the order of the day, and so you will refrain from a direct assault and instead attempt to gain a better understanding of the situation surreptitiously.

TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_04<tab>You look on in silence as Sri Lakshmi impassively explains to the distraught Qalyana broodmother that while her daughter's flesh has been restored to life, her soul is forever lost. Watching the forlorn spectacle, you are reminded once more of Ga Bu, the kobold boy whom you could not save, and of the cycle of misery perpetuated by the primals. But the anger you feel is naught to that of Alisaie, who, forsaking all concealment, proceeds to loudly decry Sri Lakshmi for her empty promises, before begging the Qalyana to see her for the false god she is. Alas, the broodmother will not listen, and the primal soon takes umbrage. With a wave of her hand, she sends orbs of energy towards you as a warning. Leave her lands and her dreamers be.

TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_05<tab>Twice has Alisaie watched helplessly as those consumed by tragedy have turned to primals for succor. Yet though she could do no more for the broodmother than she could for Ga Bu, she had to try...did she not? Either way, her failure has left you with no recourse but to meet the primal in single combat─ably abetted by the goodly adventurers who you had the wisdom and foresight to summon to Djanan Qhat in anticipation of this outcome. Sri Lakshmi must be slain.

※Emanation can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_06<tab>With a flash of light, the Lady of Bliss departs, and with her whatever succor her dreamers may have enjoyed. Naught remains to keep you here...

TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_07<tab>As you tell Lyse of the primal's passing, the Qalyana broodmother appears, bereft at the death of her god. Though Lyse tries to reason with the grieving mother, she condemns you and your actions, demanding at last that you leave her to mourn. And so you do.

TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SEQ_08<tab>Though the Vira will not soon forget your deeds this day, neither will the Qalyana. Was there another way you could have resolved the situation? Perhaps...but you will never know.

target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_TODO_00<tab>Следуйте за Важрой.

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_TODO_01<tab>Attune to the aetheryte at Djanan Qhat.
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_TODO_01<tab>Настройтесь на эфирит в Джанан Кхат.

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_TODO_02<tab>Attune to the aetheryte in Djanan Qhat.
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_TODO_02<tab>Настройтесь на эфирит в Джанан Кхат.
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_TODO_03<tab>Поговорите с Ализе.
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_TODO_04<tab>Бросьте вызов Шри Лакшми в испытании «Эманация».
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_TODO_05<tab>Бросьте вызов Шри Лакшми в испытании «Эманация».
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_TODO_06<tab>Поговорите с Лиз.

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_000_001<tab>We were too late for him in Limsa, but this time...this time...
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_000_001<tab>В Лимсе для него уже было всё потеряно, но на этот раз... на этот раз...

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALPHINAUD_000_005<tab>I am reminded of the tragedy we bore witness to beneath O'Ghomoro, when poor Ga Bu cried out in despair and rage, and Titan came forth in answer...
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALPHINAUD_000_005<tab>Всё это живо напоминает мне трагедию, свидетелями которой мы стали под О'Гоморо, когда Га Бу сумел лишь силой своих эмоций призвать Титана...

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_LYSE_000_010<tab>I'm not sure why Alisaie's so eager to face this primal all of a sudden, but you won't hear me complaining!
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_LYSE_000_010<tab>Не знаю, почему это Ализе так торопится сразиться с этим праймалом... Но я не жалуюсь!

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_VAJRA_000_020<tab>You are ready? Hm. You look ready.
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_VAJRA_000_020<tab>Вы готовы? Хм. С виду вы во всеоружии.

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_VAJRA_000_021<tab>Djanan Qhat. There you find the Qalyana's cryssstals, and Sri Lakshmi. Follow me.
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_VAJRA_000_021<tab>Джанан Кхат. Там вы отыщете крис-с-сталлы Калана, и саму Шри Лакшми. Следуйте за мной.

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_000_025<tab>I expected more resistance. Let us pray our luck holds...
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_000_025<tab>Я полагала, нам окажут какое-никакое сопротивление. Надеюсь, удача сегодня на нашей стороне...

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALPHINAUD_000_030<tab>It would be in our best interest to avoid any confrontation unless absolutely necessary. The primal and the crystals are our primary objectives.
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALPHINAUD_000_030<tab>Лучше всего по возможности будет избегать любых конфронтаций. Праймал и кристаллы — вот наша главная цель.

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_LYSE_000_035<tab>We should follow their lead and let them do any fighting for now. You'll need your strength when the time comes.
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_LYSE_000_035<tab>Идём за ними. Если они хотят испытать себя в дипломатии — милости просим. А твоя сила нам пригодится в будущем.

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_VAJRA_000_040<tab>Djanan Qhat. The path leads to an entrance above.
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_VAJRA_000_040<tab>Джанан Кхат. Наш путь ведёт ко входу наверху.

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_VAJRA_000_041<tab>Within is an aetheryte. You must use it to enter.
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_VAJRA_000_041<tab>Внутри есть эфирит. Используйте его, чтобы попасть в святилище.
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALPHINAUD_000_042<tab>Понял. Эй, все, за мной!

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_VAJRA_000_050<tab>The aetheryte is within. I will go no further. Good luck, eikon-slayer.
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_VAJRA_000_050<tab>Эфирит внутри. Я не смею идти дальше. Удачи вам, убийца айконов.

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALPHINAUD_000_070<tab>(I knew things were not going to end well the moment she stepped out of hiding...)
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALPHINAUD_000_070<tab>Я сразу понял, что тут дело нечисто, в тот самый момент, когда она показалась из укрытия...

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_LYSE_000_075<tab>Ugh... Is there really no way we can fight alongside you without being turned into one of her dreamers?
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_LYSE_000_075<tab>Гм... А точно нет никакого способа для нас сражаться рядом с тобой, без риска быть превращёнными в марионеток Лакшми?

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_000_080<tab>I know, I know, it was stupid and foolish but...but I had to try, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I had to.
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_000_080<tab>Знаю, знаю, это было глупое ребячество, но... Но я должна была попытаться, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Должна была.

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_000_082<tab>I had to try...and I failed. So you have to fight. There is no other way.
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_000_082<tab>И попыталась... но не смогла. Теперь тебе придётся сражаться. Другого выхода нет.
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_Q1_000_150<tab>Что вы скажете?

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_A1_000_151<tab>I'll wake them from the dream.
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_A1_000_151<tab>Любой сон когда-нибудь заканчивается.
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_A1_000_152<tab>Главное, не останавливайся.

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_A1_000_153<tab>Primals cannot be suffered to live. You know this.
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_A1_000_153<tab>Праймалам нельзя позволить существовать, ты это прекрасно знаешь.

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_000_084<tab>Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I know you will.
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_000_084<tab>Спасибо, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Знаю, ты это остановишь.

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_100_084<tab>It means a lot to hear you say that. It does. But it doesn't make it any easier to have to ask you to face that...that thing.
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_100_084<tab>Знаешь, услышать от тебя такое... Многое для меня значит. В любом случае, возможно, это по моей вине тебе предстоит драка с этой... штуковиной.

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_200_084<tab>Maybe so, but every time we must turn to you and others like you to do what we cannot. I just wish there was another way...
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_200_084<tab>Верно, но каждый раз нам приходится обращаться к тебе и таким как ты, поскольку сами мы не можем справиться с этой угрозой. Если бы только был другой путь...

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_300_084<tab>We can but do that which is within our power. Lyse, Alphinaud, and I will go and seize their crystal stores. This will not happen again.
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_300_084<tab>Мы делаем лишь то, что в наших силах. Лиз, Альфино и я отправимся разорить их запасы кристаллов. Нельзя допустить, чтобы подобное повторилось.

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_400_084<tab>And you... When it is finished...we will be waiting for you.
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_400_084<tab>И ты... Когда закончишь... в общем, мы будем тебя ждать.

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_000_085<tab>We came too late for Ga Bu, but perhaps, this time, when the primal is no more...
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_000_085<tab>В прошлый раз для Га Бу было слишком поздно, но на этот раз, теперь, когда праймала нет...
TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_SCENE00015_EVENTAREA_WARP_YESNO_TITLE<tab>Войти в Эманацию?

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALPHINAUD_000_110<tab>We had to use force to secure the crystals. Alisaie...was not gentle.
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALPHINAUD_000_110<tab>Нам пришлось использовать силу, чтобы заполучить кристаллы. Ализе... слишком не церемонилась.

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_000_115<tab>You've finished, then. Good. I'm glad it's over.
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_ALISAIE_000_115<tab>Ты здесь. Хорошо. Рада, что всё закончилось.

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_VAJRA_000_120<tab>Hm. You yet live... I had my doubtsss. Welcome back.
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_VAJRA_000_120<tab>Хм. Вы до с-с-сих пор живы... Я сомневалась. С возвращением.

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_LYSE_000_130<tab>I wish we could have left on better terms, but that was never going to happen. It could be a problem if they get their hands on any more crystals, though...
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_LYSE_000_130<tab>Хотелось бы мне оставить впечатление более положительное после нашего пребывания в деревне, но увы, <var 08 E905 ((сама)) ((сам)) /var> понимаешь. Если бы мы оставили им хотя бы немного кристаллов...

source: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_LYSE_000_131<tab>Never mind. We'll deal with that when the time comes.
target: TEXT_STMBDA606_02532_LYSE_000_131<tab>Ладно, забудь. Даже если что и случится, мы разделаемся с возникшей проблемой.
